tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Silent Service
programme.desc: Mac and Harm are having trouble relating...a result of working together under stress for so long.(n)

programme.title: JAG: King of the Greenie Board
programme.desc: Harm is now a Tomcat division commander aboard the carrier USS Patrick Henry that is patrolling the Mediterranean near Yugoslavia.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: The Russians are furious over the killing of their peacekeepers and the Navy sends Mac, Brumby, and Roberts to the Patrick Henry to conduct the court-martial of Lt. Buxton.(n)

programme.title: JAG: True Calling
programme.desc: When a petty officer smuggles a pregnant Serbian woman aboard the carrier in order to save her from a vengeful fiancée, he's arrested and scheduled to be court-martialed.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Psychic Warrior
programme.desc: When a Navy research project involving ESP and psychic phenomenon goes awry, resulting in the death of one of the research subjects, the Admiral in charge is court-martialed.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Rouge
programme.desc: As the lowest ranking lawyer at JAG, Bud is assigned to accompany Raglan, a former Special Forces operative who is hired by the Pentagon to test security at military bases.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crime Every Mountain
programme.desc: As Cabe's trial looms over Team Scorpion, a simple case goes sideways when they help a father and his daughter whose plane crashes nearby.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.sub-title: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.desc: As Team Scorpion anxiously awaits the verdict of Cabe's trial which could send him to prison, they focus their nervous energy on trying to save a dog stuck in a cistern.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: A Christmas Car-Roll
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, when Walter chooses work over spending quality time with his friends, he falls down the stairs and hits his head, and as he lays unconscious, he enters a dream world where Team Scorpion never existed.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Bunker Games
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must work with Toby's nemesis, Quincy Berkstead and his wife, Amy , when they are locked inside an artificially intelligent doomsday bunker that aims to kill them.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Lighthouse of the Rising Sun
programme.desc: A solar storm knocks out power in Los Angeles, and Team Scorpion must help a teen pilot and his girlfriend who are lost over the Pacific without navigation or radio contact.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: When Andy and Nick’s seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who’s lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT1
programme.desc: 30 East Drive is said to house the most violent poltergeist in the world. The team go head first into what becomes their toughest challenge yet. As soon as they enter the property something is waiting and wants to be known.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT2
programme.desc: The team continue their most threatening investigation yet and for some they will be scared for life mentally and physically. The most violent poltergeist in the world is ready for a fight...but who wins?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Armley Mills
programme.desc: Once the centre of industry Armley Mills is now a museum that is said to house the phantoms of many a lost soul. From children who were caught in the machinery to a bad tempered floorwalker who doesn’t like people in his mill.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Black Country Living Museum
programme.desc: The team have a whole village to investigate with results that amazed the all. With a playful spirit communicating through the Ouija board and the EVP machine at the same time the team seem to have their first two-way conversation with the dead.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Carr House
programme.desc: Part of a once splendorous manor and a history that goes back as far as Robin Hood, Carr House is the sight of many a paranormal occurrence.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fort Ticonderoga
programme.desc: Fort Ticonderoga,located in upstate New York,is being haunted by the dead from three nationsand needs help from the TAPS team.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghost Mission
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to San Juan Capistrano, California to investigate the San Juan Capistrano Mission.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Corpses
programme.sub-title: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Corpses
programme.desc: The house, formerly owned by the \\"Father of American Surgery,\\" harbors a dark secret deep beneath its floors. Now restless spirits inhabit the home in which they were once the subjects of experiments and research.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Signals From the Past
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the TAPS team is on Rose Island to investigate their haunted lighthouse. This island housed cholera victims exiled from Newport, and many of the sick never returned to the mainland.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Buyer Beware
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Naples, New York, to investigate the Naples Hotel.This hotel was built in 1895.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.sub-title: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Answers Given to Questions Never Asked
programme.desc: A message from a collector sends Dylan on a quest to rescue a hostage and find the remains of the Commonwealth fleet.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Pieces of Eight
programme.desc: Citizen Eight tries to remove Dylan from command of the Andromeda.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Waking the Tyrant's Device
programme.desc: The crew must stop a world shipbuilder before he launches another invasion.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.108
programme.desc: Woman accuses ex-boyfriend of coercing money and housing with suicide threats/Teens dispute sale of stolen car in hit-and-run.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.97
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-roommate-to-be of stealing her security deposit; she is countersued for rent and money owed/A 21st birthday celebration ends with a young woman allegedly wrapping a borrowed car around a pole.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.240
programme.desc: A scam with online surveys causes a rift between a father and son over a fraudulent check. A woman, after her house burns down, has conflicts with her daughter's boyfriend's family over a wreck and unpaid rent.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.46
programme.desc: Man defends against ex-girlfriend's claim of unauthorized use and damage to her Buick Regal, insisting it was a hit-and-run/Woman sues former friend for allegedly stealing belongings stored in her garage.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.151
programme.desc: Neighbors sue over car windshields shot with BB gun. Lawsuit involves ominous chalk drawing of child, invasion of privacy, and harassment in volatile living arrangement dispute.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.90
programme.desc: Man accuses ex-lover of stalking; she alleges he cheated with child's mother. She sues for unpaid bills. Woman claims ex-fiancé is volatile; he sues for stopped check payment and punitive damages, alleging fraud.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.74
programme.desc: Young woman hit by car at underage drinking party blames icy driveway; driver claims she should have moved. Siblings fight over deceased father's home ownership, leading to a feud.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.169
programme.desc: Woman accuses toddler's grandmother of selling her belongings during prison term. Man denies dating former friend suing for unpaid loans and ring return, suggests she move on.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.259
programme.desc: A young tenant disputes custody of a band's equipment and unpaid rent with former landlords. Man sues seller and girlfriend for refund after alleged failed vehicle purchase from online ad.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.39
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute Suzuki motorcycle purchase, crash, and cancelled insurance.Young man arrested for assault, fails drug test, violates probation, bailed out by girlfriend; he claims bailout was birthday gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.45
programme.desc: A woman accuses her former live-in boyfriend of vandalism and skipping out on his share of the rent/Alleged harassment that led to a man’s dismissal at work and a dispute over an unpaid loan land ex-lovers in court.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Five classic sauces: hollandaise, bechamel, demi-glace, veloute and tomato, must be the basis of the contestants dishes in this challenge.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Putting a twist on the original dishes eaten by a happy couple on their wedding day fifty years ago is the challenge for the remaining contestants.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Creating an innovative gourmet sandwich in just 30 minutes is the challenge for the contestants, with the winners being flown to a wine tasting.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The challenge set for the remaining contestants is a blind taste test, with the winning team heading off on a trip to Sea World.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Three Michelin-starred chefs judge a lobster dish cooked by the contestants as the challenge, with a prize of having caviar at a top restaurant at stake.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs are challenged to create a dish with as much consideraton for presentation as taste, with the winner receiving a makeover and photoshoot.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baked
programme.desc: Audrey embarks on a new start after quitting her demanding job; however, her time at home makes her stir crazy, prompting her to start a cookie business. Timmy is getting advice from the guys who encourage him to be more of a dude than a gentleman.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Les-Bro
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey embark on finding a surrogate mother, only to run into problems with the interviewing process. Russell's wealthy mother comes to town, and he reluctantly decides to have her stop paying his rent.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mannequin Head Ball
programme.desc: Stuck with a store Jeff leased for Audrey's fleeting cookie shop, he and Adam stay behind to clean up and discover a new game using the heads of mannequins.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Big Picture
programme.desc: When his mother cuts off Russell’s trust fund, he gets a taste of how life will be after moving in with Timmy. Meanwhile, Audrey helps Jeff impress his boss in order to get a raise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fun Run
programme.desc: After Jeff tells his altruistic co-workers that requests for charity donations are getting out of hand, Audrey enters into a 10K charity event and plans on having Jeff's staff contribute money toward the cause.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Refusing To Budget
programme.desc: Timmy convinces Russell he needs a budget when the utilities are turned off in his apartment. Meanwhile, Audrey has a mentee who wants to see her office and learn about publishing.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Little Bummer Boy
programme.desc: When Russell decides to borrow a holiday concept of gift-giving from Adam, both Adam and his co-workers are in for surprises. Meanwhile, Audrey wants to make people laugh at Jeff's holiday party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Home Stretch
programme.desc: When Jeff discovers that a guy is giving Audrey home Pilates classes, he wants to make a change. Meanwhile, Adam tells Jennifer specifics about his football past.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Uh-Oh It's Magic
programme.desc: When Russell takes his date to a magic show, the magician makes her disappear. Meanwhile, Audrey unknowingly slips up when she tells Brenda's girlfriend about the baby.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Singing and Dancing
programme.desc: When Timmy joins an a cappella group, he wants to keep it a secret from Russell. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey discover they have a new annoying neighbor.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Scared Straight
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gangsta in time to convince him to make the right choice?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All My Children
programme.desc: For a guy who started life as a free spirited outlaw-biker Dog has certainly turned into a family man. His children touch everything he does today, from searching for the perfect gift for his daughter Cecily's birthday to hunting a fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: The hunt for an elusive and clever criminal takes Dog through the world of a bantam fighting cock, a pregnant daughter, and a jungle safe house go together. And don't forget the mopeds as well as a group of hostile squatters on government land!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Baby
programme.desc: What's a father to do? When the cops ask Dog for help tracking down a renegade teen with a history of running hard, Baby Lyssa, eight months pregnant and counting, insists on joining the hunt. Can Dog keep his daughter safe and catch his man?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rain Check
programme.desc: For Dog and Beth it's not only another day in paradise, it's their anniversary. Beth is hoping for a romantic dinner with her man, but she knows only too well that for Dog work always comes first.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Grimm: Time Wars
programme.desc: An Evil Queen enlists Rumpelstiltskin to help her send the Avengers Grimm back in time. The Avengers will need to work together if they are to return to the present and thwart the Queen before she can carry out her evil plan.(n)

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: A group of friends uncover an otherworldly object in a rural field, which they soon discover holds greater secrets than they could imagine.(n)

programme.title: The Last Boy
programme.desc: The world at an end, a dying mother sends her young son on a journey to the place that grants wishes. A fantasy drama inspired by the works of the 13th Century Sufi Mystic and Poet Rumi.(n)

programme.title: The Arrival
programme.desc: Radio astronomer Zane Zaminsky believes he has picked up a cosmic noise that signals extraterrestrial intelligence. His desperate search for answers leads him to discover that aliens are already on Earth and in the process of preparing to take it over.(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a call-girl-turned-actress and works to help her advance her career, but things get a little more complicated than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: A Boy Called Sailboat
programme.desc: A small family finds hope in their extraordinary son named Sailboat when a personal gesture awakens a global desire.(n)

programme.title: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
programme.desc: When video-game enthusiast, Sarah is transported into her favorite game, she finds herself on an intergalactic prison, home to the most dangerous villains in the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.sub-title: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.desc: Jack Hunter is abducted blindfolded to a Turkish US base to be recruited by the NSA, told his mentor was killed because Albert Littmann's Russian mob employer Doridanov want the ancient Osiris-weapon.(n)

programme.title: Banana Joe: Banana Joe
programme.desc: A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.(n)

programme.title: Christmas For Three
programme.desc: When a successful bachelor suddenly finds himself as the guardian of a 10 year old boy, he leans on the smart and beautiful social worker for help, only to fall in love with the woman who turned his life upside down.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wish
programme.desc: When Paula chose Gary over Nick, 15 years later she’d be married, with tons of debt. At Christmas, when Nick reappears, now a rich, successful art broker. A little Christmas magic and she is transported to the life with Nick.(n)

programme.title: Holiday in The Hamptons
programme.desc: A woman inherits her grandfather's home in the Hamptons and reconnects with her childhood love.(n)

programme.title: All I Want For Christmas
programme.desc: One Christmas a boy wishes he could change places and his dream comes true! But he soon discovers that without his parents and friends it's actually a curse. The only problem is - can he reverse his disastrous wish and get his family back again.(n)

programme.title: A Deadly Affair
programme.desc: Suspecting her husband of having an affair, a woman trails him to the house he's been renovating only to discover that he's dead. As the investigation unfolds, things are not what they seem.(n)

programme.title: Wish You Were Dead
programme.desc: Hayley tries to make ends meet for herself and her daughter while providing alimony for an ex-husband. She wishes her problems with her ex could go away.(n)

programme.title: The Wrong Mother
programme.desc: Kelsey Larsen’s dream finally came true: beautiful twins from an in vitro procedure. But when Kelsey needs home care, the nurse she hires is none other than the egg donor herself — and the crazy woman has come to claim "her babies"!(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of the Wilderness Family
programme.desc: A Los Angeles construction worker (Robert F. Logan) moves his wife (Susan Damante Shaw), son and asthmatic daughter (Hollye Holmes) to the Rockies.(n)

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: A heroic squire (Stephen Moyer) protects a princess (Katherine Heigl) and tries to retrieve the sword Excalibur from Viking raiders.(n)

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: On Luce Price's first day at the Sword & Cross boarding school, her attention is captured by the strangely familiar Daniel Grigori. She soon discovers he is a fallen angel who has battled over her for centuries.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Hoss befriends a violent man after Adam and Little Joe warned him to stay away.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Adam tries to prove to Hoss his love interest is a Gambler only interested in his money.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Little Joe tries teaching a deaf girl sign language after seeing her get mistreated by her father.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The Cartwrights construct a grist mill to help neighbor Tom Edwards, a disabled man who blames Ben for his condition. Ezekiel, the hired hand is also cheating him out of his money.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leader’s daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.(n)

programme.title: Mumbo Jumbo
programme.desc: Thomas Doubting stumbles upon a magical amulet which takes him on a mysterious journey to the island of Sinmouth. The locals believe he is 'Mumbo Jumbo' – an entity who will restore their fortunes and rescue the beautiful Princess Vanilla.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Experience the magical world of 'The Secret Garden' as never before in this beautiful production of the classic tale. When her parents are lost in a tragic accident, Mary must seek comfort in the strange and forgotten corridors of Misselthwaite Factory.(n)

programme.title: Grace and Goliath
programme.desc: Hollywood big-shot Josh Jenkins sweeps into Belfast to make a movie, but before long his world crashes and he loses everything. Hotel cleaner Lily invites him to stay with her family and gradually the people of this 'strange' city touch his heart forever.(n)

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.(n)

programme.title: Funny Money
programme.desc: When Henry Perkins accidentally trades his briefcase with a man, he finds five million dollars inside. However, the cash draws in Mr. Big, who wants to reclaim his money.(n)

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: A lonely widow plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes, to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever.(n)

programme.title: The House in Nightmare Park
programme.desc: A struggling actor is invited to a large country home to perform a dramatic reading. Outwardly, the host is complimentary and enthusiastic, but his more sinister intentions are eventually made clear.(n)

programme.title: The Uncanny
programme.desc: An author, convinced that cats are conspiring to replace the human race as masters of the earth, narrates three bizarre tales of feline terror.(n)

programme.title: Act of Murder
programme.desc: An actor attempts to win his former mistress back by putting stress on her husband by poisoning their family dog, and the farm animals at their country place, simulating a robbery attempt.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a mortician in 1958 who is strangely obsessed with the suicide of a teen-age German girl. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of an aging pool shark in 1954, faced with the match of his lifetime. Shari Headley guest stars. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: Leaping in Without a Net - November 18, 1958
programme.desc: An acrophobic Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a 1958 trapeze artist preparing for a death-defying stunt. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) is a burly nightclub bouncer who is helping a stripper (Julie Brown) rescue an infant from its abusive father.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) finds himself on an ocean liner in 1954 as a desperate young man trying to win back the heart of his ex-wife. Also stars Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Al (Dean Stockwell) attempts to adjust his past through Sam (Scott Bakula), who has become an undercover cop in 1969.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Half dense Players (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante is assigned to take custody of an unusual murder suspect, a beautiful artist plagued by strange visions that may threaten reality itself.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: A Dark and Stormy Night (REDUX)
programme.desc: Darius reconciles with Luc, while making peace with Dante, but the sinister forces that follow him are not far behind.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Supermax (REDUX)
programme.desc: After Rudolpho sells the Tulip out from under them, the crew scheme to take it back from the new owner, who wants to turn the ship into a maximum security prison.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: A Twist in Time (REDUX)
programme.desc: While transporting an insane convict named "Five," Dante diverts course to answer a distress call from a graviton research station on Triton, which is experimenting with the distortion of space and time.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Nine Lives
programme.desc: Everyone who steals a statue that represents the Egyptian cat-goddess Mafdet is killed. Now, the statue has disappeared and Sidney and Nigel are tasked with retrieving it.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rodeo Ton
programme.desc: 1970s El Toro mechanical bull used to train bull riders; silver WWII era banjo; a collection of 1800s handcrafted hunting duck decoys.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)
